name: Simple Yet Effective
full_text: Simple Yet Effective - Tin Can Knits This simple little pattern knits up quick and it’s perfect for that special skein. Who could ask for more? Want to keep up with Tin Can Knits? Sign up for our email updates and we will let you know about our new designs and great in-depth tutorials . PATTERN INFO sizing: one size: 20 (45) inches around and 10 inches high (easily adjustable) materials: 200 (400) yards DK weight yarn (sample shown in Sweet Fiber Cashmere DK in ‘marshland’) Gauge: 22 sts & 28 rounds per 4 inches in stockinette Needles: US #6 / 4 mm (or as required to meet gauge) Helpful Tutorials Casting on for knitting in the round For all pattern abbreviations, techniques, and to contact us, visit www.tincanknits.com
